      • initializeNewGame

        public static boolean initializeNewGame(ca.mcgill.ecse223.quoridor.model.User user1,
                                        ca.mcgill.ecse223.quoridor.model.User user2,
                                        int thinking_time_seconds)
        This is a static method which takes two User parameters to initialize a new game. It will return a boolean value to indicate if a new game is successfully initialized.
        Parameters:
        user1 - The first player who will join in the game
        user2 - The second player who will join in the game
        thinking_time_seconds - Thinking time in the unit of second
        Returns:
        A boolean value to indicate if a new game is initialized successfully

      • updateNewUserName

        public static boolean updateNewUserName(ca.mcgill.ecse223.quoridor.model.User aUser,
                                        java.lang.String name)
        This is a static method which takes an user and a name, then set the latter as the new name of the former. It will return a boolean value to indicate if the name is updated successfully.
        Parameters:
        aUser - The player who want to select a new name
        name - The new name
        Returns:
        A boolean value to indicate if the name of the user has been updated

      • getGameStatus

        public static ca.mcgill.ecse223.quoridor.model.Game.GameStatus getGameStatus(ca.mcgill.ecse223.quoridor.model.Game game)
        This is a static method which check the status of a game. It will return a GameStatus value of the status of a certain status.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to be checked
        Returns:
        A GameStatus value of the status of the game to be checked
